location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter forwarding Statements of Table Expenses incurred at Bushire during Colonel Stannus's absence 4 September to 14 November 1826, and noting that he had been obliged to certify the expenses for September 1826 as there had been no European Officer in charge of the Residency at that time.
